page.title: 04CHILDREN'S LEISURE IN G'M
page.content: Watching television was the overwhelmingly favourite pastime of 11 year olds,the favourite programme being "The Young Ones",a rather off-beat,slightly vulgar,comedy show.Reading was also a popular activity,fiction being preferred to non-fiction,and animal stories being the favourite.Several boys liked playing games on their computer and several girls liked listening to pop records.Tennis was the most popular outdoor activity and a lot liked playing it,but very few said they did anything else outside,despite the fact that there is a cricket pitch and a recreation ground in 2 of the villages.There was also a marked lack of participation in organisations like brownies and cubs,even though there is a cub pack in Gilmorton.
